topic.title: will this year start ww3??
topic.body: what do u think about worldwar 3 this year??? all over the world the fire ist burning (syria,russia,ukraine,northkorea etc..)

1_1E8KDakJCmMofVgTawocXc4pX9Fn3K3ob1.body:
> [balancer73](#comment_32_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): The WW3 began in 1945 and ended in 1991 with the defeat of the Warsaw Bloc.

i think we will get a war against muslim and christians....

> [alaric](#comment_22_1HiyP7AD74uGuGBZLqhcmfQgwu5VC8nnYY): I think there's potential for WW3, but I also think people are starting to wake up to the "Divide and Conquer" regime that's been manipulating us for the last 15-20 years - Make us fight amongst ourselves and hate each other so we don't realize who the problem really is - Central Banks, corrupt politicians, old world money, etc... [...]

yes your comment is 100% true.....
i think behind all jews and bankster are an forgotten power elite maybe not human???
